column1: File:Brackenbrook in the Madge Badger Inn-LOTRO-1.jpg and the player in the Mad Badger Inn
The Mad Badger Inn is an inn found in the middle of Archet. Captain Brackenbrook commanded Archets garrison from the inn.The Lord of the Rings Online
column3: Intro: Captain Brackenbrook It was destroyed when the Blackwolds attacked Archet.The Lord of the Rings Online
